title: Sky Ring
description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

title: Space Gun
description: See the world upside-down, dangling from high up above the ground!

title: Air Race
description: An exhilarating flight simulation with banks, loops and dives.

title: Water Pendulum
description: Hold on tight as you glide up and down on a water tube across a U-shaped slide!

title: Korneto
description: Slide, swirl and splash through a whirling vortex on this slippery ride!

title: Water Falls
description: Get drenched under a cascading waterfall with steep rocks.

title: Happy Kangaroo
description: Plummet into a safe freefall with a tall & cheerful kangaroo!

title: Pony Train
description: Hop onto a chariot-pulled pony ride through the world of fantasy!

title: Mini Pirate Ship
description: Sail like a pirate on a miniature, adrenaline-filled flying boat!
